#Packages

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

#Top 5 and Bottom 5 Moisturizers Based on Rating

```{r}
data <- read.csv('product_info.csv')

moisturizers_data <- data %>%
  filter(secondary_category == "Moisturizers")

top_3 <- moisturizers_data %>%
  arrange(desc(rating), desc(reviews), desc(loves_count)) %>%  
  slice_head(n = 3)         

print(top_3)
```
